sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar ali oseba
with another thing or person
, sta obe osebi skupaj na enem kraju.

seg.quote: I stayed with her until dusk.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
with someone else
, tisto storimo še z nekom.

seg.quote: Boys do not generally play with girls.

sense.def:
To fight or argue with someone
pomeni nekomu nasprotovati, se bojevati ali prepirati z njim.

seg.quote: Judy was tired of quarrelling with Bal.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
with a particular tool or object
, tisto storimo tako, da uporabimo določeno orodje ali predmet.

seg.quote: He brushed back his hair with his hand.

sense.def:
Izraz
with
uporabimo, kadar omenjamo lastnost, značilnost ali lastnino nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: ...an old house with steep stairs and dark corridors.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj napolnjeno ali prekrito
with things
, ima neke stvari v sebi ali na sebi.

seg.quote: The building is decorated with bright banners.

sense.def:
Izraz
with
uporabimo, kadar želimo povedati, kako nekdo nekaj dela ali kaj čuti, ko tisto dela.

seg.quote: Their fossils were studied with great care.
Jordache looked over at his son with genuine surprise.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
with
tudi izrazimo čustvo, zaradi katerega se nekdo vede na določen način.

seg.quote: This experience leaves him quaking with fear.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
with
povemo, s čim je povezana naša trditev.

seg.quote: There was a particular problem with claims for maternity allowance.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
with
tudi povemo, da se nekaj zgodi ob istem času kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: He didn't have the courage to put his hat on with Perkins watching him.
With advancing age, reactions become slower.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
with
napovemo dejavnik, ki na nekaj vpliva in je zato pomemben za tisto, kar govorimo.

seg.quote: With all the traffic jams, it wouldn't be economic.
